Reviews.Title: Great mobile phone!!!
Reviews.Author: R. D. Guariento
Reviews.Content: The zn300 is a great cellphone. First of all I am not in the mood for a smartphones. I have devices to surf in the web, to make presentations, to read documents. Actually I do all these things with my notebook and with my kindle on the go. My objective was to have a nice phone with long battery life that I could send SMS text and play music (mp3 and fm radio). It also have a camera! The design of this phone is great. It is small and good looking. Very satisfied. Motorola did a nice work here.If you want a cellphone this one is great! If you want a smartphone look for something else.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Watch fan
Reviews.Content: I did not get this phone from Amazon, but from my local phone company. I have about 2 years with it, no issues at all. Solidly built, durable, metal back cover, nice looking slider, big numbers keypad, comes with a 2 GB micro SD, micro USB (Almost standard today) charger / connection, very good battery life (Idle can be 2 days), the sound is good, etc. Also picks signal well. Perfect size, not too small not too big. It does well what a cell phone is supposed to do.

Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 400 hours of standby time.
